attributes.action: make it compulsory to have a licence for the breeding and s
attributes.background: I've seen a petition going around to make it compulsory to spay and neuter all cats but I do not believe this to be an appropriate solution for the ongoing stray problem. I think its totally ridiculous and far fetched as all cats will go extinct.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
